item.title: My Neovim Go Setup
item.description: Recently, I moved from writing my Go in VSCode to writing it in Neovim. I did this for two main reasons: Ubiquity I use Neovim for writing pretty much all my other code (except Java), so it was weird to use VSCode for this one purpose. Terminal Integration I hate the VS Code terminal. It doesn’t have the character support I want, and it overrides a bunch of keys (for example, Ctrl+f for fish autocomplete).
